label: Full Body Type I Only
desc: Scenario 1: Full body Type I deicing only

steps.text: Iceman, this is N443DF. We are configured for Type I. Engines are running, APU is off. Request full body Type 1 application.
Captain, please prepare the aircraft for deicing.
Iceman aircraft N443DF, ready for deicing.
Aircraft N443FD starting application of Type I now.
Captain, N443FD, deicing complete. Post-deicing check complete, deicing personnel and equipment are safely away.
Iceman, aircraft N443DF copies. Stay warm out there!
